text:
@sardesairajdeep shameless journo! 

Feb 27 to Mar 1: 16,000 people attend Tablighi Jamaat gathering in Kuala Lumpur, hundreds get COVID-19
Mar 19: Modi addresses India, emphasizes social distancing
Mar 21 to 23: 8,000+ people attend a Tablighi Jamaat gathering in Delhi,  many get COVID-19
